title: Mission Hill - Complete Series - Disc 1
description:
Mission Hill - The Complete Series

Disc 1 of 2

Plot Summary

    * Genres: Comedy, Animation
    * Plot Outline The misadventures of a group of disparate roommates who live       in a hip neighborhood in a major city.
    * Plot Synopsis: From Bill Oakley and Josh Weinstein, former Executive Producers and Head Writers of The Simpsons. It&#039;s just around the corner and close to home - a funky, colorful neighborhood where a college degree can bring you an exciting career in retail sales. Welcome to Mission Hill. Meet overqualified, underemployed, 24-year-old Andy French. Ambition: to be a cartoonist. Occupation: salesman at Waterbed World. Hobby: Where&#039;s the party? But responsibility soon knocks on the door of the loft apartment Andy shares with two fellow slackers: Kevin, a nerdy 17-year-old who wears his SAT score on his shirt and his admiration for big brother Andy on his sleeve, moves in. And for good measure, so does the French family&#039;s dog. Friends, roomies, canines, countrymen: lend me your beers. They&#039;re all part of the daze of Andy&#039;s life. And all here in this Complete Series DVD Set. Party on.

Product Details

    * Directors: Scott Alberts, Michael Dante DiMartino
    * Format: Animated, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, DVD-Video,Subtitled, NTSC
    * Language: English
    * Region: Region 1 (U.S. and Canada only. Read more about DVD formats.)
    * Aspect Ratio: 1.33:1
    * Number of discs: 2
    * Rating NR
    * Studio: Castle Rock
    * DVD Release Date: November 29, 2005
    * Run Time: 290 minutes
    * DVD Features:
          o Available Subtitles: English, Spanish, French
          o Available Audio Tracks: English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)
          o 13 episodes on two discs
          o Commentary by creators, producers, writers and voice talent on four episodes
          o Interactive map of Mission Hill
